ygData.messageBody:
Phil, I would save it up for your next level to be honest. The spells are
increasingly more expensive as you go. We don't get much great armor as
wizards and I just think keeping it around would be more prudent right now,
maybe someone will be selling a fine steel staff or a runed totem staff
that you hear.. those would be good buys if reasonable. I have 50pp in the
bank and am saving up til I hit my next level to purchase spells personally.
